title: 怎么崩溃了，求教
author: kid小东
txt_content:
崩溃报告
---- Minecraft Crash Report ---- // I let you down. Sorry :(  Time: 16-11-26 下午3:51 Description: Initializing game  java.lang.SecurityException: SHA-256 digest error for assets/minecraft/texts/splashes.txt         at sun.security.util.ManifestEntryVerifier.verify(Unknown Source)         at java.util.jar.JarVerifier.processEntry(Unknown Source)         at java.util.jar.JarVerifier.update(Unknown Source)         at java.util.jar.JarVerifier$VerifierStream.read(Unknown Source)         at java.io.FilterInputStream.read(Unknown Source)         at sun.nio.cs.StreamDecoder.readBytes(Unknown Source)         at sun.nio.cs.StreamDecoder.implRead(Unknown Source)         at sun.nio.cs.StreamDecoder.read(Unknown Source)         at java.io.InputStreamReader.read(Unknown Source)         at java.io.BufferedReader.fill(Unknown Source)         at java.io.BufferedReader.readLine(Unknown Source)         at java.io.BufferedReader.readLine(Unknown Source)         at bxp.(SourceFile:97)         at bss.ak(SourceFile:468)         at bss.a(SourceFile:302)         at net.minecraft.client.main.Main.main(SourceFile:124)   A detailed walkthrough of the error, its code path and all known details is as follows: ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------  -- Head -- Stacktrace:         at sun.security.util.ManifestEntryVerifier.verify(Unknown Source)         at java.util.jar.JarVerifier.processEntry(Unknown Source)         at java.util.jar.JarVerifier.update(Unknown Source)         at java.util.jar.JarVerifier$VerifierStream.read(Unknown Source)         at java.io.FilterInputStream.read(Unknown Source)         at sun.nio.cs.StreamDecoder.readBytes(Unknown Source)         at sun.nio.cs.StreamDecoder.implRead(Unknown Source)         at sun.nio.cs.StreamDecoder.read(Unknown Source)         at java.io.InputStreamReader.read(Unknown Source)         at java.io.BufferedReader.fill(Unknown Source)         at java.io.BufferedReader.readLine(Unknown Source)         at java.io.BufferedReader.readLine(Unknown Source)         at bxp.(SourceFile:97)         at bss.ak(SourceFile:468)  -- Initialization -- Details: Stacktrace:         at bss.a(SourceFile:302)         at net.minecraft.client.main.Main.main(SourceFile:124)  -- System Details -- Details:         Minecraft Version: 1.8.1         Operating System: Windows 7 (amd64) version 6.1         Java Version: 1.8.0_101, Oracle Corporation         Java VM Version: Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM (mixed mode), Oracle Corporation         Memory: 33594360 bytes (32 MB) / 128290816 bytes (122 MB) up to 1038876672 bytes (990 MB)         JVM Flags: 2 total; -Xincgc -Xmx1024M         IntCache: cache: 0, tcache: 0, allocated: 0, tallocated: 0         Launched Version: 1.8.1         LWJGL: 2.9.1         OpenGL: AMD Radeon HD 7560D GL version 4.4.13283 Compatibility Profile Context 14.501.1003.0, ATI Technologies Inc.         GL Caps: Using GL 1.3 multitexturing. Using GL 1.3 texture combiners. Using framebuffer objects because OpenGL 3.0 is supported and separate blending is supported. Shaders are available because OpenGL 2.1 is supported. VBOs are available because OpenGL 1.5 is supported.          Using VBOs: No         Is Modded: Probably not. Jar signature remains and client brand is untouched.         Type: Client (map_client.txt)         Resource Packs: []         Current Language: 简体中文 (中国)         Profiler Position: N/A (disabled)
欢迎大湿告诉我

replies.author: Lss233
replies.txt_content: 需要删除客户端jar文件中的META-INF目录
